articles.title: Son dakika deprem mi oldu? Az önce deprem nerede oldu? İstanbul, Ankara, İzmir ve il il AFAD son depremler 13 Şubat 2026
articles.title_tr: Son dakika deprem mi oldu? Az önce deprem nerede oldu? İstanbul, Ankara, İzmir ve il il AFAD son depremler 13 Şubat 2026
articles.summary: Son depremler... Son dakika deprem mi oldu? Az önce deprem nerede oldu? İstanbul, Ankara, İzmir ve il il AFAD son depremler.. 13 Şubat 2026 deprem son dakika haberleri haberin detayında... Artçı deprem mi oldu? Son deprem büyüklüğü ne kadar? Yakınımdaki depremler nelerdir? Anlık deprem mi oldu? Son dakika canlı deprem Türkiye haritası.. Kandilli Rasathanesi ve Deprem Araştırma Enstitüsü ve AFAD deprem haberleri.. İstanbul'da deprem mi oldu? Ankara'da deprem mi oldu? İzmir'de deprem mi oldu? Hangi illerde deprem oldu ve hissedildi? Bugün deprem mi oldu? Deprem ne zaman ve kaç şiddetinde oldu? En son hangi bölgede deprem oldu? Deprem haberleriyle ilgili en çok merak edilenlerin cevabı haberde..

articles.title: PlayStation Is Bringing Back An Unexpected Series With A New, Zelda-Like Spin
articles.title_tr: PlayStation Is Bringing Back An Unexpected Series With A New, Zelda-Like Spin
articles.summary: For the first time in almost five years, Kena is making a comeback. As announced at Sony's State of Play, the sequel to Kena: Bridge of Spirits is coming tp PlayStation 5 and PC later this year. The first look at Kena: Scars of Kosmora features the title character as a more experienced Spirit Guide. The gameplay is also giving off some Zelda vibes as she uses her magic to survive new challenges.          In this story, Kena has earned a reputation for her heroism. But she's about to be tested when her magical staff is shattered. Since that staff was helping to keep Kena alive, she'll need to find a new source of magic to sustain her.More to come...Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Legacy Of Kain: Defiance Rises Again With New Remaster
articles.title_tr: Legacy Of Kain: Defiance Rises Again With New Remaster
articles.summary: It's time to return to Nosgoth once again, as today's State of Play revealed a remaster of Legacy of Kain: Defiance is on the way. Released back in 2003, Defiance was the third chapter in the Soul Reaver saga. The big twist here was that Raziel and Kain were both playable characters, allowing players to step into the boots of the vampire lord and his former lieutenant.Legacy of Kain: Defiance Remastered officially launches on March 3 for PS5 and PS4, and preorders are opening today. Crystal Dynamics is developing the remaster.The remaster features updated HD graphics, a new third-person camera, and wayfinding level maps, along with bonus features like character skins and lost levels, along with a photo mode. A digital deluxe version includes digital comics and a playable demo of Dark Prophecy, the unreleased sequel to Defiance.Continue Reading at GameSpot

Crystal Dynamics is developing the remaster.The remaster features updated HD graphics, a new third-person camera, and wayfinding level maps, along with bonus features like character skins and lost levels, along with a photo mode. articles.title: Ghost Of Yotei Becomes Legendary With New Multiplayer DLC Coming In March
articles.title_tr: Ghost Of Yotei Becomes Legendary With New Multiplayer DLC Coming In March
articles.summary: After being teased at last year's Gamescom, fans have their first look at Ghost of Yotei Legends, and it'll be available in March. Legends is a free online co-op mode included with patch 1.5 for all Ghost of Yotei owners. In this mode, players team up with friends to battle powerful, supernatural versions of the Yotei Six.Players can choose from four classes: Samurai, Archer, Mercenary, or Shinobi. Every class can use a katana and ranged weapons, but each one specializes in different combat styles. The Samurai wields the odachi and uses the widest range of weapons. The Archer can fight with a spear (yari) and carry an extra ranged weapon. The Mercenary uses dual katanas and utility-focused skills. The Shinobi fights with a kusarigama and focuses on stealth abilities. Each class can unlock unique armor cosmetics by completing in-game challenges.          As players level up, they can earn powerful legendary weapons and gear by taking on harder difficulties. Photo Mode returns, allowing teams to capture action moments together. Between missions, the new Legends lobby offers ways to relax, including combat and archery practice, friendly games of Zeni Hajiki, and Bamboo Strike high-score challenges.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: 4 Loop Has A Giant Rubik's Cube Boss And Alien Berries That Teleport Enemies
articles.title_tr: 4 Loop Has A Giant Rubik's Cube Boss And Alien Berries That Teleport Enemies
articles.summary: 4 Loop, the co-op shooter from Left 4 Dead designer Mike Booth and JJ Abrams' studio Bad Robot Games, has a roguelike structure, along with lots of wacky, interlocking systems like alien plant life and and a Rubik's Cube boss. State of Play February 2026 showed off more of what to expect from the recently-announced game.           This story is developing.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Death Stranding 2 PC Port Releases In March
articles.title_tr: Death Stranding 2 PC Port Releases In March
articles.summary: After some subtle teasing, a PC port for Death Stranding 2: On the Beach has officially been confirmed. The PC version will launch on March 19, featuring PC-specific features like upscaling and frame generation, along with support for ultrawide monitors.Preorders are going live today, February 12, on Steam and the Epic Games Store.The PC edition is being made by Nixxes Software, and it will also support uncapped framerates. The PC version can be played with a DualSence controller or mouse and keyboard. Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Denizde mahsur kalan göçmenler helikopterle kurtarıldı
articles.title_tr: Denizde mahsur kalan göçmenler helikopterle kurtarıldı
articles.summary: İzmir'in Foça ilçesi açıklarında sabah saatlerinde göçmenleri taşıyan lastik botun batması sonucu 3 göçmen öldü, 38'i kurtarıldı. Kaybolduğu değerlendirilen 4 kişi için arama kurtarma çalışması başlatıldı. Milli Savunma Bakanlığı, denizde mahsur kalan iki kazazedenin, Hava Kuvvetleri Komutanlığına bağlı helikopter yardımıyla kurtarıldığı anlara ilişkin görüntülerini paylaştı.

articles.long_summary_tr: İzmir'in Foça ilçesi açıklarında sabah saatlerinde göçmenleri taşıyan lastik botun batması sonucu 3 göçmen öldü, 38'i kurtarıldı. Kaybolduğu değerlendirilen 4 kişi için arama kurtarma çalışması başlatıldı. Milli Savunma Bakanlığı, denizde mahsur kalan iki kazazedenin, Hava Kuvvetleri Komutanlığına bağlı helikopter yardımıyla kurtarıldığı anlara ilişkin görüntülerini paylaştı.

articles.title: The Last Two GameSpot GOTY Winners Are Both On Sale On Steam Right Now
articles.title_tr: The Last Two GameSpot GOTY Winners Are Both On Sale On Steam Right Now
articles.summary: If you've been waiting for last year's GameSpot Game of the Year winner, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, to go on sale, then you're in luck. Steam is not only offering a discount on Expedition 33--it's also bundling the title with the 2024 GameSpot Game of the Year winner, Metaphor: ReFantazio.As part of Sega's Year of the Horse sale on Steam, the Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 x Metaphor: ReFantazio bundle is available for $72. Separately, Metaphor: ReFantazio is on sale for $35, which is 50% off its $70 price. Clair Obscur only has a 10% discount, bringing its price down from $50 to $45. However, the bundle takes an additional $8 off the sale price of the two games together.Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 amassed several top awards in 2025, including The Game Awards' Game of the Year. GameSpot's review scored it a 9/10 and praised its emotionally engaging story and the compelling cast of characters who live in that world. It's an RPG that "blends aspects of traditional JRPGs with reactive, parry-heavy action." Reviewer Richard Wakeling closed out his review by saying, "This is a supremely confident game that reinterprets familiar mechanics with an imaginative eye. Its combat is a consistent delight, delivering thrills with thoughtful strategy and reactive action in equal measure, complementing a heartfelt story of shared grief and camaraderie."Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Türkiye ile Suriye arasında koordinasyon mekanizması kurulacak
articles.title_tr: Türkiye ile Suriye arasında koordinasyon mekanizması kurulacak
articles.summary: Cumhurbaşkanlığı İletişim Başkan Yardımcısı Ferhat Pirinççi, Türkiye ile Suriye arasında iletişim alanında köprü görevi görecek ve 7/24 esasına göre işleyecek bir iletişim mekanizmasının kurulmasının planlandığını, bu mekanizma sayesinde iki ülkenin karşılıklı olarak tecrübelerini paylaşacağını belirtti.
